# isAnimating

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value indicating whether the animation is in progress.

## Declaration

```swift
var isAnimating: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] when the animation is in progress or [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] when it is stopped.

## Controlling and Monitoring an Animation

- **start()**: Starts the animation represented by the receiver.
- **stop()**: Stops the animation represented by the receiver.
- **currentProgress**: The current progress of the animation.
- **currentValue**: The current value of the animation effect, based on the current progress
